name: There's Been a Murder (LorenPenny)
description:
Inspector Brown arrives at the scene of a crime and is greeted by an unfamiliar situation, there are 6 suspects to the misdeed and all are known to the deceased.

It's up to you to decide who is the killer.

CONTROLS
Movement - WASD or Arrow keys
Interact - Left Mouse Button
Journal - J key

This game was developed as part of my HND Game Design course, where the focus was on narrative and level design. Please note, the ending has not been fully implemented.
